name: Tsunami Cruiser
description:
Next-gen Wavy Navy, Geometry Wars style!  In this twin stick shooter, you have to guide your boat through ever rougher seas, and destroy all enemies.

You can download the game as Windows exe or Android app, or play it on the web:

http://tmtg.net/ludumdare/tsunamicruiser/game/

Touch screen and game controller supported.

Also available on Google Play and Ouya.
